Title: The Pledge
Overview: A police chief about to retire pledges to help a woman find her daughter's killer.
Tagline: Detective Jerry Black has made a promise he can't break, to catch a killer he can't find.
production_companies: Epsilon Motion Pictures, Franchise Pictures, Morgan Creek Productions, Clyde Is Hungry Films, Pledge Productions
Cast: Jack Nicholson, Aaron Eckhart, Helen Mirren
